job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are currently in search of Senior Machine Learning (ML) engineers with exceptional skill sets and a passion for large language models. Your invaluable contributions will play a pivotal role in shaping our advanced LLM stack.

   In this position, your responsibility will be to:
     * Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable
     * Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques to strike the right balance between usefulness and complexity of various methods
     * Develop production components for the LLM platform
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

We are currently in search of Senior Machine Learning (ML) engineers with exceptional skill sets and a passion for large language models. Your invaluable contributions will play a pivotal role in shaping our advanced LLM stack.

   In this position, your responsibility will be to:
     * Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable
     * Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques to strike the right balance between usefulness and complexity of various methods
     * Develop production components for the LLM platform

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes working with large language models (LLMs), conducting experiments with deep learning methods for LLM products, and exploring fine-tuning, evaluation, and data retrieval techniques. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and improving LLM-based applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to experimenting with and improving the performance of models (deep learning methods) for LLM products, which falls under the core definition of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques
job_tasks.justification: Fine-tuning, evaluation, and synthetic data generation are all direct activities involved in the process of creating, training, and adapting machine learning models, specifically generative models in this context.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production components for the LLM platform
job_tasks.justification: Developing 'production components' implies building and integrating software elements that will be part of a live system, which is a key aspect of software development for AI applications.
